properties.name: akkorhotel.properties.mongo-uri
properties.description: The connection URI for the MongoDB database.

properties.name: akkorhotel.properties.database-name
properties.description: The name of the database used by the application.

properties.name: akkorhotel.properties.allowed-origins
properties.description: A list of allowed origins for CORS requests.

properties.name: akkorhotel.properties.mail-modified-username
properties.description: The subject line for emails notifying users about username changes.

properties.name: akkorhotel.properties.mail-register-subject
properties.description: The subject line for registration confirmation emails.

properties.name: akkorhotel.properties.mail-register-confirmation-link
properties.description: The URL template for the registration confirmation link sent in emails.

properties.name: akkorhotel.properties.cloudinary-api-key
properties.description: The API key for Cloudinary used to upload and manage images.

properties.name: akkorhotel.properties.cloudinary-cloud-name
properties.description: The Cloudinary cloud name associated with the account.

properties.name: akkorhotel.properties.cloudinary-api-secret
properties.description: The secret API key for Cloudinary authentication.

properties.name: akkorhotel.properties.default-user-profile-image
properties.description: The URL of the default profile image for new users.

properties.name: akkorhotel.properties.app-email
properties.description: The email address used by the application for sending system notifications.
